price: Hakika Sisi tumeifanya Qur'ani kwa Kiarabu ili mfahamu.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: Hakika Sisi tumeijaalia Qur'ani iwe kwa lugha ya Kiarabu, ili mweze kuelewa umuujiza wake, na mweze kuzingatia maana zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
